mapper.insert: insert into t_fast_menu (TFM_ID, DATA_VERSION, GMT_CREATE, GMT_MODIFY, TR_ID, TM_ID,FAST_MENU_NAME,FAST_MENU_SORT) values (#{tfmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{tuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fastMenuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fastMenuSort,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_fast_menu set FAST_MENU_SORT=FAST_MENU_SORT+1 where FAST_MENU_SORT >= #{fastMenuSort}
update t_fast_menu set FAST_MENU_SORT=FAST_MENU_SORT-1 where FAST_MENU_SORT >= #{fastMenuSort}
mapper.select: select count(1) from t_role_menu where TM_ID=#{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select tfm.FAST_MENU_NAME fastMenuName, tfm.TFM_ID tfmId, tfm.CLICK_NUM clickNum, tfm.FAST_MENU_SORT fastMenuSort, tfm.REMARK remark, tfm.GMT_CREATE createTime, tfm.GMT_MODIFY modifyTime, tfm.DATA_VERSION dataVersion, tm.MENU_URL menuUrl, tm.MODEL_TYPE_FLAG menuType from t_fast_menu tfm inner join t_menu tm on tfm.TM_ID = tm.TM_ID where tfm.to_id in (select tuo.TU_ID from t_user tu inner join t_user_organization tuo on tu.tu_id = tuo.tu_id where tu.tu_id =#{id}) and tfm.OPEN_STATE = 0 order by tfm.FAST_MENU_SORT asc,tfm.CLICK_NUM desc
mapper.update: update t_fast_menu set OPEN_STATE = #{openState,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where TFM_ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
